metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20199 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Rootless containers run with Podman, receive all traffic with a source IP address of 127.0.0.1 (including from remote hosts). This impacts containerized applications that trust localhost (127.0.01) connections by default and do not require authentication. This issue affects Podman 1.8.0 onwards.

criterions.comment: libpod package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
